list_definition.definition: to cause or order to go or be taken

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The teacher sent the disobedient boy to the headmaster

list_definition.definition: to move rapidly or with force

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He sent the ball right into the goal.

list_definition.definition: to cause to go into a certain, usually bad, state

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The news sent them into a panic.
